body.name: EppieBasic Desk Lamp, Architect Desk Lights for Home Office, Eye Care Led Desk Lamps with Clamp Dimmable & 4 Color Modes, 24V Bright Table Lamp Office Lighting for Working Reading Study
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35

features: 【Easy Control & Wire Management】EppieBasic office desk lamp features a sleek one-piece design, no annoying wires on the dimmable desk lamp. The clip on desk lamp features sensitive visual touch buttons that can be easily operated by simply touching the touch area of the lamp head. clamp desk lamp on/off button function: press and hold to blink once to set a 30-minute timer, press and hold to blink twice to cancel.

【360° Adjustable Flexible Gooseneck& Space Saving】The black desk lamp features a 360° gooseneck design, enjoys unrestricted positioning without unwanted drooping, and Easily adjusts light direction and angle. With a maximum height of approximately 25.5 inches, a rechargeable desk lamp tailored for 32-inch monitors (compatible with 29, 27, 24-inch, etc.). A scratch-resistant metal clip accommodates desks up to 1.77 inches thick. It is Compact and space-saving, perfect for small workspaces.

【Eye-Caring and Energy-Saving】The desk light with clamp uses high-quality LED (800LM), special light reflection design and high color rendering (RA>90). The desk lamp has uniform brightness, no glare, no ghosting, soft light, restores the color of objects, and reduces eye fatigue. And the 16.53-inch light strip effectively illuminates the entire desktop area. table lamp for the office desk save 80% energy than traditional incandescent lamps, providing you with an environmentally friendly lightin

【Multiple Dimmable lighting modes】The LED lamp desk can be easily switched between 4 brightness levels and 4 color temperatures (3000K-6500K) by the touch of a button, creating a comfortable working environment for your home office. Different lights meet the needs of different scenes, suitable for drawing, sewing, making, reading and as a nail desk lamp. In addition, the memory function of the bright desk lamp will remember your last setting for convenient use.

【24V Power Adapter & Customer Service】: 1 clip desk lamp, 1 power adapter, 1 user manual. You can power the lamp through the adapter. The 24V power supply makes the LED desk lamp brighter, has better heat dissipation, and has a longer service life without frequent replacement. In addition, we provide 24-hour customer service, if you have any questions or needs, please contact us and we will provide you with a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 24V Power Supply Strong Support: Provide 24V charging adapter, no need to worry about insufficient brightness.Multiple Lighting Modes: Easily switch between 16 lighting modes.30-Minute Timer Function: Easily set the time for lighting with the 30-minute timer function.Front Touch Button: Easy to operate, adjust brightness and mode without turning the lamp over.No Glare/Flicker: Protect your eye health from glare and flicker.360° Flexible Gooseneck: Direct the light where you need it to meet various lighting angles.

Versatile Lighting Modes, Meeting Diverse Needs Instant Lighting Control: Instantly adjust brightness, color temperature, and timer functions with just a tap.Seamless Brightness Adjustment: Achieve exactly your preferred lighting level.Intuitive Color Temperature Change: Easily switch between warm and cool lighting with the touch of a button.Great User Experience: Elevate your lighting control experience with the lamp's intuitive touch interface.

Timing Function ON/OFF button function on the EppieBasic Desk Lamp: Long press and flash once to start the 30-minute timer, long press and flash twice to cancel. Slim Clamp Design The EppieBasic table lamp clip is designed with a silicone pad, which can well protect the bottom of the table from damage. If you choose to mount against a wall, it is recommended to leave approximately 1.37 inches of space between the wall and the tabletop for flexible mounting. Adjustable Flexible Gooseneck The soft, adjustable gooseneck design of the table lamp allows you to effortlessly direct light exactly where you need it. Whether you're working, reading or relaxing, you'll get the perfect angle for the most comfortable lighting.

Versatile Lighting for Every Environment From focused work to comfortable relaxation, the EppieBasic Desk Lamp is perfect for your needs.24V super bright table lamp with touch buttons to adjust brightness and color to transform your space and create the ideal ambiance for any occasion.Let it become your right-hand assistant for work, study, and creativity, improve your work efficiency, enhance your reading experience, and easily create an atmosphere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Solid, wide and bright desk lamp,
reviews.reviewText: I'm very pleased with my new Office Led Desk Lamp. It arrived within 2 days, was packed with care and was easy to assemble. I'm particularly impressed with the heavy base--very stable! The 24" expanse of the light/control bar covers my entire work space plus materials required (and is adjustable). The control bar contains multiple intensities of light and color temperature settings which, once set to your preferences, can be turned off or on with one touch and without need to reset. The design of the lamp not only streamlines the look of my office but also provides additional space on the desk --no need for 2 lamps any more. Just for fun: The instruction manual also contains a clever letter from the lamp to the new owner! I recommend this product. Barbara Price, Hemet, CA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A must have for workstations!
reviews.reviewText: Absolutely recommend for workstation areas or places you do a lot of projects.I've been searching for a lighting solution in the garage which didn't involve having to install a ceiling hanging light. Traditional desk lamps where bulky and too small for my table. This LED Lamp is the PERFECT solution.It's sleek & slim - which means it never gets in the way. The base is solid metal but still thin enough to not take up too much room. Product came with a small screwdriver for the screws but I used my own. Took me a couple minutes to set up and it was ready to go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice, easy to assemble, simple functions, BUT
reviews.reviewText: The previous lamp I had stopped working 11 months after purchase. I'm hoping this one will last a lot longer. Eppiebasic lamp is nice, easy to assembly, and has simple functions. However, I do not think it is worth the price. It is also sold with a clamp which is currently priced nearly $12 less. Why that much difference in the price, I wonder. It suits my need, it's doing what it's suppose to do, it's a keeper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Over A All-In-One
reviews.reviewText: I love this lamp! It fits perfectly over my Dell Inspiron One 23". The bass sits directly under the monitor and therefore takes up no desk space. The adjustable light temp makes it easy on your eyes. Well made, easily adjustable height, and thin enough to look modern and unobtrusive. Very happy with this purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Missing end cap
reviews.reviewText: ***Update**** I contacted Amazon and they put me in touch with the seller. Customer service was awesome. They send me a replacement right away!!!!Original post - Love how bright this lamp is. Perfect for my desk. Would have give 5 stars but it is missing a cap on one end.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really, really great lamp!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The features of this lamp are awesome!!! The lamp works great for my desk application. The base is heavy and stable. The flexible neck is great. The electronics are fantastic, perfect!!!! Really, really great lamp. The cord is about 5-6ft long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love that this lamp is extra wide! It provides a whole lot of light across the table. And it has a flat sturdy base which makes it easy to situate the area surrounding the lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Defect (flickering light) after a few months of use
reviews.reviewText: I was very happy at the beginning: very bright, easy to use, perfect shape/dimension etc. ... till last night when I noticed flickering lights. Some others also mentioned the same, but I was hoping I wouldn't see this.This is after only a few months of use, and also I did not use too frequently (a few hours every few days, so < 10 hours per week).In my case, flickering seems happening among 4 LEDs: one oscillates on/off, and when that one goes off the neighbor 3 gets brighter (more current/voltage? maybe they are grouped by every 4 LEDs?).I would not recommend this product or this brand, as this is probably a quality control issue.

reviews.reviewTitle: The desk lamp is a excelent well made quality product.
reviews.reviewText: I'm very happy with the desk lamp. I use it in my home office desk and in the evening when there's not as much of natural light, the desk lamp lights up my work space. You have a excellent quality product. The customer service folks are great too. They resolved my concern promptly and were very professional.Keep up the great work.....

reviews.reviewTitle: Good Lamp suited for my workplace
reviews.reviewText: It is a really good lamp that is flexible and adjustable.

Le mode d'emploi est en plusieurs langues mais pas en français. On off c'est facile mais lorsqu'on arrive à la programmation selon l'éclairage de la journée, ça se complique. Autrement, je ne regrette pas du tout cet achat.
